name: Bouncing Ball (itch) (Aditya Chaudhary)
description:
“Bouncing Ball” is a simple but thrilling puzzle platformer. You have to move a continuously bouncing ball left and right to collect all the 3 stars in order to break the chain and pass the level.

You can only move the ball left and right and not up and down.
Rest you know:)

Controls: Left and Right keys only(or A and D)
